all_derivs <- list()
all_second_derivs <- list()

for (i in seq_along(fd_groups)) {
  mean_fd <- mean.fd(fd_groups[[i]])
  deriv_fd <- deriv.fd(mean_fd)
  all_derivs[[i]] <- eval.fd(Time, deriv_fd)
  all_second_derivs[[i]] <- eval.fd(Time, deriv.fd(deriv_fd))
}
